languages.text: Рука Ульфара была искалечена в пасти Доппельгренделя. Придавая особое значение этой боевой отметине, Космический волк отказался заменить ее аугментикой.
Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.
languages.original_text: Рука Ульфара была искалечена в пасти Доппельгренделя. Придавая особое значение этой боевой отметине, Космический волк отказался заменить ее аугментикой.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.
Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.
Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.
Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.

languages.text: 乌尔法的手，被化身者咬得血肉模糊。乌尔法对这只手有着特殊的感情，不肯用植入物来代替。
languages.original_text: Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法的手，被化身者咬得血肉模糊。乌尔法对这只手有着特殊的感情，不肯用植入物来代替。

languages.text: ウルファーの手はドッペルグレンデルに噛み砕かれずたずたになっていた。この戦いの戦利品という特別な意義を持つため、スペースウルフは手をオーグメティックに替えることを拒んでいる。
languages.original_text: Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.

traits.locale_text: ウルファーの手はドッペルグレンデルに噛み砕かれずたずたになっていた。この戦いの戦利品という特別な意義を持つため、スペースウルフは手をオーグメティックに替えることを拒んでいる。

languages.text: La mano de Ulfar quedó destrozada por las fauces del Doppelgrendel. El Lobo Espacial, que concede un significado especial a este trofeo de batalla, se niega a sustituirla por un aumético.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.

traits.locale_text: La mano de Ulfar quedó destrozada por las fauces del Doppelgrendel. El Lobo Espacial, que concede un significado especial a este trofeo de batalla, se niega a sustituirla por un aumético.

languages.text: La main d'Ulfar a été mutilée par la gueule du doppelgrendel. Le Space Wolf, qui accorde une importance particulière à ce trophée de bataille, refuse de la remplacer par un augmétique.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.

traits.locale_text: La main d'Ulfar a été mutilée par la gueule du doppelgrendel. Le Space Wolf, qui accorde une importance particulière à ce trophée de bataille, refuse de la remplacer par un augmétique.

languages.text: Ulfars Hand wurde in den Kiefern der Doppelgrendel verstümmelt. Weil der Space Wolf dieser Kampftrophäe eine besondere Bedeutung zumisst, will er sie nicht durch eine Augmentation ersetzen.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.

traits.locale_text: Ulfars Hand wurde in den Kiefern der Doppelgrendel verstümmelt. Weil der Space Wolf dieser Kampftrophäe eine besondere Bedeutung zumisst, will er sie nicht durch eine Augmentation ersetzen.

languages.text: Ulfar'ın eli, Suretçalan'ın dişleri arasında ezildi. Bu savaş ganimetine özel bir anlam yükleyen Uzay Kurdu, elini bir ogmetikle değiştirmeyi reddediyor.
languages.original_text: Ulfar's hand was mangled in the jaws of the Doppelgrendel. Attaching special significance to this battle trophy, the Space Wolf refuses to replace it with an augmetic.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar'ın eli, Suretçalan'ın dişleri arasında ezildi. Bu savaş ganimetine özel bir anlam yükleyen Uzay Kurdu, elini bir ogmetikle değiştirmeyi reddediyor.
